Class AdminReviewModerationController

java.lang.Object
com.FeedEmGreens.HealthyAura.controller.AdminReviewModerationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/admin/review-moderation") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public class AdminReviewModerationController extends Object
Controller responsible for administrative review moderation actions.

This controller provides functionality for admins to:

  • View and manage flagged reviews
  • Resolve review flags (approve removal or dismiss)
  • Hide or delete inappropriate reviews
  • Record and track administrative moderation actions

Access to all endpoints in this controller is restricted to users with the ADMIN role.

Since:
2025-11-07
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • getPendingFlags

      @GetMapping("/pending") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ReviewFlag>> getPendingFlags()
      Retrieves all pending review flags awaiting moderation.

      This endpoint returns the list of all flagged reviews currently marked with status PENDING, representing the moderation queue for admins.

      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the list of pending ReviewFlag objects

    • resolveFlag

      @PutMapping("/flags/{flagId}/resolve") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> resolveFlag(@PathVariable Long flagId, @RequestParam String action, @RequestParam(required=false) String notes)
      Resolves a review flag by either approving the removal of the flagged review or dismissing the flag.

      When resolved, the flag’s status is updated accordingly:

      • REMOVE → Status becomes RESOLVED
      • DISMISS → Status becomes DISMISSED
      A record of this moderation action is also logged via AdminActionLogRepository.

      Parameters:
      flagId - the ID of the flagged review to resolve
      action - the action taken, either REMOVE or DISMISS
      notes - optional moderator notes describing the decision
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success message or an error response
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the flag cannot be found or is already resolved

    • getAllFlags

      @GetMapping("/flags") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ReviewFlag>> getAllFlags(@RequestParam(required=false) String status)
      Retrieves all flagged reviews, optionally filtered by their moderation status.

      If no status is specified, all flags are returned. This endpoint is commonly used in the admin dashboard for comprehensive visibility of all flagged reviews.

      Parameters:
      status - optional filter for flag status (e.g., PENDING, RESOLVED, DISMISSED)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the list of ReviewFlag objects

    • hideReview

      @PutMapping("/reviews/{reviewId}/hide") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> hideReview(@PathVariable Long reviewId, @RequestParam String reason)
      Hides a review from public visibility, with a specified reason provided by the admin.

      This action does not permanently delete the review but marks it as hidden for moderation or policy-related reasons.

      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review to hide
      reason - the reason for hiding the review
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a success message

    • adminDeleteReview

      @DeleteMapping("/reviews/{reviewId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> adminDeleteReview(@PathVariable Long reviewId, @RequestParam String reason)
      Permanently deletes a review from the system, with a reason provided by the admin.

      This endpoint should be used for serious cases such as offensive, false, or inappropriate content. A corresponding admin action log is recorded via the ReviewService implementation.

      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review to delete
      reason - the reason for deletion
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a confirmation message
